title: Aesthetics of Instructional Design for Transformative Learning Experiences: Blended Language Education Curriculum

context.prior_knowledge: Job-based intermediate language proficiency and grasp of fundamental instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Immersive learning environment combining digital device-based practice with offline collaboration

learning_goals: Learners can evaluate the visual and structural completeness of language education materials with over 80% accuracy using instructional design aesthetic principles (five principles)
Learners can integrate at least three elements—meaning-making, consistency, and immersion—when designing activities based on transformative learning experiences
Learners can design a 30-minute practical language education scenario within two weeks applying 12 guidelines and incorporate peer feedback
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
